attributes.action: Allow Geert Wilders entry in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On February 12th 2009, Geert Wilders, Dutch MP, was refused entry in the UK.

The United Kingdom has a long democratic tradition and freedom of speech is a fundamental part of it.

The People of the United Kingdom should be allowed to form their own opinions about Mr Wilders views.

Not granting entry to Mr Wilders is an act of censorship that goes against the most fundamental values of our democracy and this should be rectified.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
